DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this prospective randomised study is to investigate electrocardiographic alterations after intravascular injection of three different test solutions of bupivacaine and epinephrine in anaesthetised children up to 16 years of age.
DOC.brief_title: Sensitivity of ECG on Detection of Three Different Intravascular Applied Test Doses of Bupivacaine and Epinephrine
DOC.criteria: Age 0 to 16 healthy parental consent ASA >1 allergy against local anaesthetics
